properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: SSM REPORTED, IRON WORKER WAS RECEIVING A BEAM ON 13TH FLOOR. THE BEAM SWANG, HIS FINGER WAS CAUGHT BETWEEN THE BEAM. THE WORKER WAS TRANSPORTED TO HOSPITAL.
properties.Detail_of_Description: Brandon was working as a connector for the above contractor. While setting a beam his hand got caught between the column and the beam. Stonebridge incident/accident form indicates this took place at 8am this morning.Worker error: hand in wrong spot. wait
properties.Cause_Equipment: 424 east 34thst :incident.   Stonebridge local 40 ironworker: Brandon Bauersfield lost his smallest or pinky finger from his right hand. He was taken to NYU LANGONE MEDICAL CENTER, where he was treated and released to return home: 244 93rd street, 2n

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: NYPD / FDNY IS REQUESTING DOB INSPECTION DUE TO CRANE COLLAPSE. COLLAPSE ONTO VEHICLES. SEVERAL INJURIES BEING REPORTED.
properties.Cause_Equipment: While attemping to boom crane to street , crane collapsed  totally.

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: SSM REPORTED, WHILE UNLOADING STEEL STRUCTURALS THE CRANE BUMPED INTO THE SIDWWALK SHED PARAPET CAUSING MINOR DAMAGE. NO ONE WAS INJURED.
properties.Detail_of_Description: Violations for shed does not meet code color specification, construction fence not hunter green.

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: FDNY REPORTED BEAM FELL FROM CRANE, 2  FATALITIES
properties.Cause_Equipment: While attemping to set a 6000lbs beam, rigging rated for 3000lbs failed, allowing Beam to fall to ground with 2 Fatalites ,HMO was crushed by end of beam falling on cab  and iron worker fell 4 stories striking head.
